alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 20 at 2:51PM MST until December 23 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM WEDNESDAY TO 10 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. Strong wind gusts of 50 mph or greater will be possible at times. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central and southeast Colorado. * WHEN...From 10 PM Wednesday to 10 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
